title: This game was my life
body:
I guess I just gotta find a new life, then

Since anyone with the capability of getting upset by trolls isn't allowed on here

Well, at least I still have the PBE. I got another Honour 5 orb just today!

replies.body:
How dare you. Do you think the "game" part is all League had? I met a lot of friends on here. Good friends. Great friends! And now the ones I didn't immediately add on Discord are just gone, left to wonder what happened!

Funny how hundreds of people can enjoy your company enough to add you as a friend, but all it takes are just a few trolls willing to bully you in-game long enough to elicit a response in order to deem you "objectively toxic."

Interesting, my original comment here was removed by the moderators, not sure why.

I'm sorry if it was a little sarcastic, let me try saying it another way.

A video game is supposed to be for entertainment. If it's giving you negative feelings or has encompassed your whole life, you may want to consider finding other outlets for entertainment.

You're allowed to be upset by trolls. What's not allowed is retaliation, and this is spelled out in the terms of service. Your actions are your own, whether you were defending yourself or not. It's best to mute and move on...don't let them upset you.
Been going downhill since tencent bought them.
pbe sucking fuck now. developers just dont care. Riot just dont care. this game dead soon
Been going downhill ever since they removed dominion. Maybe even before.
